mapper.select: select a.*,r from(select aa.* ,rownum r from (select * from mod_missionstate s left outer join mod_missioninfo i on s.mission_info_id = i.mission_info_id left outer join mod_missioncategory c on c.mission_category_id = i.mission_category_id where mission_state = 4 order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM) aa order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM)a where r < 2
select profile_picture from mod_users where user_nickname = #{user_nickname}
mapper.update: update mod_missionstate set successed_count = 1+successed_count, mission_evaluation_count=1+mission_evaluation_count where mission_state_id=#{mission_state_id}
update mod_missionstate set mission_evaluation_count=1 + mission_evaluation_count where mission_state_id=#{mission_state_id}
update mod_missionstate set mission_state = 2 where mission_evaluation_count > 9 and successed_count > 5 and mission_state_id=#{mission_state_id}
update mod_missionstate set mission_state = 3 where mission_evaluation_count > 9 and successed_count < 5 and mission_state_id=#{mission_state_id}
